hero.title: Unlock Hidden Tax Savings for Your Business
hero.subtitle: Discover personalized tax strategies that could save you thousands. Our expert analysis reveals opportunities you might be missing.

treasureHunt.title: Tax Strategy Treasure Hunt
treasureHunt.description: Answer a few questions and discover which tax strategies you qualify for. It takes just 5 minutes and could save you thousands.

strategies.title: QBI Deduction Optimization
strategies.description: Maximize your Qualified Business Income deduction under Section 199A. We help structure your business to claim up to 20% deduction on qualified income, potentially saving thousands annually.

strategies.title: Reasonable Compensation Strategy
strategies.description: Find the optimal balance for S-Corp owners between salary and distributions. Proper compensation planning can significantly reduce self-employment taxes while maintaining IRS compliance.

strategies.title: Business Structure Optimization
strategies.description: Evaluate whether your current entity type is tax-efficient. Converting to an S-Corp, LLC, or other structure could provide substantial annual savings based on your situation.

strategies.title: Equipment & Technology Deductions
strategies.description: Accelerate depreciation through bonus depreciation and Section 179 deductions. Turn necessary business purchases into immediate tax savings.

strategies.title: Vehicle & Travel Optimization
strategies.description: Maximize deductions for business use of vehicles, travel expenses, and home office deductions. Proper documentation and strategy can unlock significant savings.

strategies.title: R&D and Innovation Credits
strategies.description: Claim research and development credits for software development, product innovation, and process improvements. Many businesses qualify without realizing it.

benefits.title: Personalized Analysis
benefits.description: Every business is unique. Our Treasure Hunt tool analyzes your specific situation to recommend strategies that actually apply to you.

benefits.title: Quick Discovery
benefits.description: In just minutes, discover tax strategies that could take hours of research to find. Our streamlined process gets you answers fast.

benefits.title: Compliance Focused
benefits.description: All strategies are IRS-compliant and backed by tax code. We help you save money the right way, with proper documentation and support.

benefits.title: Proven Results
benefits.description: Our clients typically save thousands annually through strategic tax planning. See what opportunities you might be missing.

finalCta.heading: Ready to Discover Your Tax Savings?
finalCta.subheading: Join thousands of business owners who have uncovered hidden tax strategies with our Treasure Hunt tool.
